item.title: My Blog, in Hugo
item.description: Why not kick things off with talking about Hugo, the static site generation tool?! I’ve heard lots of good things about Hugo for some time now, and I definitely have a preference for tools written in Golang (personal bias). It’s fast, easy to pick up, and create a quick web site in minutes. Well… that’s an overstatement, I’m currently re-building this site in 4 ms each time I hit save.
